mean: having to do with working by itself without anyone operating it; just happening without thinking about it

examples.text: The camera automatically adjusts the brightness.
We automatically assumed you wanted to go with us.
Our payments are automatically deducted from our bank account each month.
The door automatically locks without a remote control.
We are automatically notified if someone tries to enter the house without a key.
The computer automatically deletes junk emails.
Your subscription will automatically renew every year.
The computer will automatically update the operating system.
